title: Karlach

how to romance karlach in bg3
content: Mayrina that Auntie Ethel killed her brothers. Approves of confronting Ethel about Mayrina being in her hut unwillingly. Convince a Surrendered Hag Ethel to let Mayrina go and give you power With a Surrendered Hag Ethel choose Mayrina's Freedom over her offer of power With a Surrendered Hag Ethel choose to execute Ethel Decepting Ethel that your reinforcements are nearly here and to give you the girl and you'll spare her Approves of asking Mayrina "Are you sure you want to do this?".
